channel.title: [508] Creating weapons
channel.description:
Ok.... Here we go again :)
Well, I'd like to be able to create Rune claws so they can hit 4 times (to be Dragon). I haven't a clue how to do it as of so-far. I'd also like to make Rune longsword (or Excalibur-but it doesn't work as it isn't support; any help?) into Vesta's. If you could help me with the "Dragon claws" then I could work the rest out maybe, remembering it's a 508 server Pali's base.
Thanks,
Aof-Scape might be back soon =D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 11:57:52 am[/size][hr]Please help :(
